Eek.  While playing through the game on a certain one of my scenarios,
the ghost that I have spent a lot of money on keeps getting zapped by
one of the clerics.

Is there anything I could do about that?  Right now, I'm going through
that scenario with one of my other characters, so that character can
get  mucho experience points.  Yes, I'm playing the level at slaughter.
